properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT M.USER_ID , R.TICKET_NO , R.CONTENT_TYPE , R.VIEW_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN RESERVATION_PAYMENT R ON M.USER_NO = R.TICKET_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND R.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT M.USER_ID , R.TICKET_NO , R.CONTENT_TYPE , R.VIEW_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN RESERVATION_PAYMENT R ON M.USER_NO = R.TICKET_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND R.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT M.USER_ID , R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_DATE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON M.USER_NO = R.REVIEW_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT M.USER_ID , R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_DATE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON M.USER_NO = R.REVIEW_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT M.USER_ID , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT M.USER_ID , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
